page.title: 18WHEATHAMPSTEAD ECOLOGY
page.content: Two of us did a survey about nature and the local environment in the Wheathampstead area.The people who live locally thought that the river and the Dyke should be cleared up and farmer's should stop building on the country side.Most people thought that the council should clean up the footpath around Wheathampstead. Most people liked the idea of putting more bins around the play area's and estate.People would also like to see more trees planted around the area.We asked if they've seen anything nature wise,one man said that he'd had deer in his garden since he'd moved into his new house.We asked people do you think there's enough river walks and nearly all the people we asked said yes.We asked do you think there should be more flower's around the estate and all the people we asked said yes.
